numContribs.description: Total number of contributions making up a scattering pattern

numReps.description: Number of independent McSAS results to compute, from which averages and uncertainties are estimated

maxIterations.description: Maximum number of iterations allowed before failing.

histogramBins.description: Amount of histogram bins used for distribution visualisation

convergenceCriterion.description: Reduced Chi-squared value to reach for optimisation success.

findBackground.description: Adds a constant background level to the model fitting.

deltaRhoSquared.description: Squared electron density contrast (mind the units!)

startFromMinimum.description: Sets the initial guess to minimal values rather than a uniform dist.

maxRetries.description: When the MC method cannot reach convergence, it will try again this number of times.

maskNegativeInt.description: Renders negative intensity values invalid for fitting

maskZeroInt.description: Renders intensity values that are zero invalid for fitting

lowMemoryFootprint.displayName: Trade speed for a drastically reduced memory footprint
lowMemoryFootprint.description: Should be used when fitting large 2D datasets

doPlot.description: Automatically plots the result upon success

qUnits.description: Order of magnitude of input units of Q to m^-1. i.e. for input in nm^-1, set this to 1e9.

IUnits.description: Order of magnitude of input units of I to (m sr)^-1. i.e. for input in (cm sr)^-1, set this to 1e2.

qMin.description: Lower bound of the Q-limits in between which the MC fit should be applied.

qMax.description: Upper bound of the Q-limits in between which the MC fit should be applied.

psiMin.description: Lower bound of the Psi-limits in between which the MC fit should be applied (2D only)

psiMax.description: Upper bound of the Psi-limits in between which the MC fit should be applied (2D only)
